thread.title: 5 things to know: Once-missing Georgia Tech student paralyzed,...

title: 5 things to know: Once-missing Georgia Tech student paralyzed,...
text:
1. Katherie Webb, former beauty queen and wife of Cincinnati backup quarterback A.J. McCarron, doesn't appreciate that the NFL Network aired a segment featuring a lot of Bengal behinds and a few third and shorts. [ Read more ]
2. Georgia Tech student James Hubert remained in the intensive care unit at Grady Memorial Hospital Tuesday, recovering from a long list of injuries his family said he suffered when he was attacked and beaten Friday night. [ Read more ]
3. A North Carolina woman who netted $88 million (after taxes) in a February Powerball drawing has spent $9 million to keep her boyfriend out of jail. [ Read more ]
4. With Mayor Kasim Reed looking on, Buckhead speculator Rick Warren was sentenced to 30 days in jail for housing code violations in Atlanta Municipal Court Tuesday. [ Read more ]
5. Tonight's forecast? Clear, cool and calm.
